newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-NORWAY'S KVARDE LIKELY TO JOIN LIVERPOOL.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-NORWAY'S KVARDE LIKELY TO JOIN LIVERPOOL.

text.p: Norway defender Bjorn Tore Kvarde looks set to join Liverpool on a free transfer in the New Year when his contract with European Cup quarter-finalists Rosenborg Trondheim expires.
Kvarde, who has also attracted interest from Scottish champions Glasgow Rangers, held talks with Liverpool manager Roy Evans this week.
"We have had discussions and gone as far as we can," Evans said. "His contract does not end until December 31 and it looks as though we've got a good chance of completing the deal with him then."
Rosenborg value Kvarde at around $2.5 million but the Bosman ruling means Liverpool will not have to pay a fee.
